channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why has Invesco’s QQQ called me two dozen times in the past few weeks? Is it a scam?
item.description: Invesco’s QQQ postponed its proxy vote again, so the calls will keep coming

item.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
item.description: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for.”

item.title: Does my friend have a right to her late father’s multimillion-dollar real-estate empire? His widow claims they’re mired in debt.
item.description: “My friend really wanted to keep her father’s condo, but her mother sold that too — and it broke her heart.”

item.title: Here’s how the best investors protect their money from market bubbles and FOMO
item.description: Managing risk and avoiding ‘volatility drag’ is absolutely critical to achieving long-term financial goals.

item.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
item.description: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits.”

item.title: Barrick Mining stock has more than doubled in 6 months. Why Elliott's activism could drive more upside
item.description: The departure of Barrick Mining's CEO in September opens up a number of opportunities for activist Elliott Investment.

item.title: Dollar General tops list of most overbought stocks this week that are due for a pullback
item.description: Several stocks ended the week looking overbought, including Dollar General, according to data compiled from CNBC Pro's stock screener.

item.title: Goldman Sachs says these five stocks, including Nvidia and Wynn Resorts, have room to run
